actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate the Big Blue Wilderness, Courthouse Mountain Wilderness, Dolores Peak Wilderness, Mount Sneffels Wilderness, San Juan and Uncompahgre National Forests in the State of Colorado.

summary.text: Designates the following as wilderness: Big Blue Wilderness, Courthouse Mountain Wilderness, Dolores Peak Wilderness, Mount Sneffels Wilderness, and Mount Wilson Wilderness, in the San Juan and Uncompahgre National Forests, Colorado.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Big Blue Wilderness, Courthouse Mountain Wilderness, Dolores Peak Wilderness, Mount Sneffels Wilderness, San Juan and Uncompahgre National Forests in the State of Colorado.
